mapper.sql: SELECT A.* ,(SELECT MAX(FILE_ID) FROM TB_FILE WHERE PARNTS_DTA_ID=A.USER_ID AND UPLOAD_FILE_NM = 'myImg') AS FILE_ID ,(SELECT BRAND_NM FROM TB_CMPY WHERE USER_ID = A.USER_ID ) AS BRAND_NM ,(SELECT CMPY_NM FROM TB_CMPY WHERE USER_ID = A.USER_ID ) AS CMPY_NM FROM BLENDING.TB_USER A

where.if: AND ( EMAIL like #{srchTxt}||'%' or FIRST_NM like #{srchTxt}||'%' or LAST_NM like #{srchTxt}||'%' )

mapper.select: SELECT 'usr' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || LPAD(NVL(Max(SUBSTR(USER_ID,17))+1,1),3,'0') AS USER_ID FROM TB_USER WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') = SUBSTR(CMPY_ID,4,14)
mapper.insert:
MERGE INTO BLENDING.TB_USER tgt USING ( SELECT #{userId} AS USER_ID ,#{firstNm} AS FIRST_NM ,#{lastNm} AS LAST_NM ,#{status} AS STATUS ,#{email} AS EMAIL ,#{phone} AS PHONE ,#{userPassword} AS USER_PASSWORD ,'Y' AS USE_YN ,#{userType} AS USER_TYPE ,sysdate AS REGIST_DT ,sysdate AS UPDT_DT FROM DUAL ) src ON (tgt.USER_ID = src.USER_ID AND tgt.EMAIL = src.EMAIL
) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tgt.FIRST_NM = src.FIRST_NM ,tgt.LAST_NM = src.LAST_NM ,tgt.USER_TYPE = src.USER_TYPE ,tgt.PHONE = src.PHONE ,tgt.REGIST_DT = src.REGIST_DT ,tgt.UPDT_DT = src.UPDT_DT WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (USER_ID, PHONE, EMAIL, FIRST_NM, LAST_NM, USER_TYPE, USER_PASSWORD, STATUS, REGIST_DT, UPDT_DT) VALUES ( src.USER_ID ,src.PHONE ,src.EMAIL ,src.FIRST_NM ,src.LAST_NM ,src.USER_TYPE ,src.USER_PASSWORD ,src.STATUS ,src.REGIST_DT ,src.UPDT_DT)
